sn45.24:1.2: “Gihino vaham, bhikkhave, pabbajitassa va micchapatipadam na vannemi.
sn45.24:1.3: Gihi va, bhikkhave, pabbajito va micchapatipanno micchapatipattadhikaranahetu naradhako hoti nayam dhammam kusalam.
sn45.24:2.4: Gihino vaham, bhikkhave, pabbajitassa va micchapatipadam na vannemi.
sn45.24:2.5: Gihi va, bhikkhave, pabbajito va micchapatipanno micchapatipattadhikaranahetu naradhako hoti nayam dhammam kusalam.
sn45.24:3.1: Gihino vaham, bhikkhave, pabbajitassa va sammapatipadam vannemi.
sn45.24:3.2: Gihi va, bhikkhave, pabbajito va sammapatipanno sammapatipattadhikaranahetu aradhako hoti nayam dhammam kusalam.
sn45.24:3.6: Gihino vaham, bhikkhave, pabbajitassa va sammapatipadam vannemi.
sn45.24:3.7: Gihi va, bhikkhave, pabbajito va sammapatipanno sammapatipattadhikaranahetu aradhako hoti nayam dhammam kusalan”ti.
